basic.description: Topics will include: Derivation of equations of motion for incompressible fluids; exact solutions for laminar flows; stability and transition; introduction to turbulence, including turbulent boundary layers, jets, wakes and mixing layers; drag reduction; introduction to the modelling of turbulence.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Fluid Mechanics III

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of MECH341 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
